pr_title: Refactor kernel config to change requires to dependencies and use a list instead of csv

timeline.bodyText: Nit - Dep doesn't convey very well that it's dependency, maybe we could just name is newServiceDependencies
timeline.author: shaguptashaikh

timeline.bodyText: I prefer use Arrays.asList("new_service2") instead of constructing the object outside.
timeline.author: ShirleyZheng92

timeline.bodyText: NIT: since you remove the comma-separated string, using regex parse may be too  much here. Just use String.split(":")
timeline.author: ShirleyZheng92

timeline.bodyText: Pattern needs to change now? We don't expect ",;" at the end of these strings now?
timeline.author: abanthiy

replies.bodyText: Pattern has been replaced with split.

timeline.bodyText: Would prefer a better naming here. Just indicate what the map is
